query: Create a weather widget with temperature and conditions
expected_behavior: Creates resources/weather-display.tsx with widgetMetadata (description, props Zod schema), default export, McpUseProvider autoSize, isPending check. Server tool with widget config. Uses widget() helper.

query: My widget shows undefined for city name when it first loads
expected_behavior: Missing isPending check. Widget renders before tool completes. Must check isPending and show loading state before accessing props.

query: I want the widget to have a button that calls a booking tool
expected_behavior: Uses callTool from useWidget(). Shows async onClick: await callTool('book-item', { id }). Includes loading state and error handling.

query: I'm getting duplicate tool registration for my widget
expected_behavior: Widget has exposeAsTool: true AND custom tool with widget: { name }. Fix: remove exposeAsTool: true from widgetMetadata (default is false) since the custom tool handles registration.

query: Show me how to build a product search widget with filter bar and product cards
expected_behavior: Uses folder-based structure: resources/product-search/widget.tsx entry point, components/ProductCard.tsx, components/FilterBar.tsx. Entry exports widgetMetadata + default component.

query: How do I make my widget look good in dark mode?
expected_behavior: Uses theme from useWidget(). Conditional styling based on theme === 'dark'. Shows both inline style and Tailwind approaches.
